website_summaries.verdict: Get a headstart on your activities with a Chromebox that boots up in seconds and is ready to play with apps, entertainment, and more.
pros: Sacrifice the latest processors for a cheaper computer with the Chromebox 2
It sports an Intel Celeron 3215U processor, 2GB of ram, and 16GB SSD storage
Includes 2 USB 3.0 ports and HDMI connectivity
While some users may want the extra power of a newer model, this machine still functions well and runs smoothly
cons: Users transferring from a non-Chrome computer may find file organization difficult

customer_reviews.title: Awesome home dev box
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the memory with 2x 8 GB, and the drive with a 256GB SSD. Pay close attention to the drive -- there are four or more types of internal SSD drives out there. I just bought the cheapest memory / drive I could find on Amazon. I put the latest Ubuntu on this box, from a USB stick. Now I have a lightning fast, (tiny, almost silent!!, ~$400) home server for all my personal coding projects.
customer_reviews.author: fengolly

customer_reviews.title: My "Perfect" Computer
customer_reviews.text: I've used this ASUS model Chromebox for may years. Always loved it. When I needed another computer, I was happy to find I could get the identical one. This one is absolutely perfect, looking and running as new. I was surprised to also receive a new keyboard and mouse in the box. NOTE: I had added 2GB Ram to my old one when I bought it, making 4GB. I wondered if this new one would work fast enough with just 2GB. It certainly does! Can't tell any speed differences so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kars-A-Plenty

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: This google chrome box is fast ,just a web browser to load and good one at that ! you will not be disappointed ! I suppose the more apps you download the slower it will boot up but using it for surfing the web is great ! I connected it to my older Samsung tv with a hdmi cable to the box ,works great and I'm using a k400 logitech wireless keyboard/mouse and I connected a lan cable to the chrome box thats coming from my router . everything works great !
customer_reviews.author: Michael Repko

customer_reviews.title: Great little computer
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the ad doesn't tell you it comes with a wall mount bracket, which I needed and was super pleased to find in the box. So if you want a little webpage/google app based computer you can screw to a wall and display on a tv with HDMI, this thing is it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's small but has a big punch!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these so far. One about 2 years ago, and one a few weeks ago. The old one still works perfectly and the new one does as well. It's a great price, and works perfectly. I primarily use it for my business. PDF', emailing, social media, Google Docs, and things like that. AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: 2GB Version is Obsolete
customer_reviews.text: All I needed was a web browser. The 2GB variant can't handle simple google docs. It hangs and crashes with three or four tabs open. This product is obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: David Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Fast, functional and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Fast, functional and affordable. Know what you're buying and this can be a rewarding purchase. Bought the 3215U (1.7 Ghz) and threw another 2GB of RAM in. I attach an external hd for any larger storage needs, but the Google Drive allowance is usually all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Cragan

customer_reviews.title: Streaming Issues
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it works wonderfully. I don't know what I would do without it. However, we mainly use it for streaming and all services, but Netflix, freeze the Chromebox when playing. I know others with this model and the same issue
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I found this Chromebox to be easy to set up, compact, reliable and inexpensive. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Carl Brick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent small PC
customer_reviews.text: If all you want to do is browse the web, use Gmail, watch YouTube etc. then this is for you. Boots fast with snappy performance.
customer_reviews.author: atari400

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Windoze
customer_reviews.text: Freeking awesome - add 128gb SSD, 4gb ram, crouton / Ubuntu 1604
customer_reviews.author: Les Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Would be a Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet, not too bright lights, hopefully will allow play apps. Overall would buy again. UPDATE: PLAY STORE WILL BE AVAILABLE ON THIS C62 UNIT.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple cheap computer I could get for my mom to use occasionally. She doesn't really know how to use the chrome box to the fullest extent, but it's simple to use and she loves it! I enjoy it because it's really easy to install and really light and super low maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

product_meta.title: ASUS CHROMEBOX2-G095U Mini Chrome OS Computer
product_meta.description: Easy out-of-the-box setup, integrated virus and malware protection and feature-enhancing updates, ASUS Chrome box starts up in seconds to get you to your favorite websites and apps instantly. It houses a processor powerful enough for ultrafast multitasking performance and the connectivity options to choose your own screen size, connecting to multiple displays at once and even attach to any VESA-mountable monitor or HD TV.
feature_bullets: Powered by Intel Celeron 3215U Processor to deliver the best performance for Chrome OS
2GB RAM and 16GB NGFF M.2 SSD for instant Boot up
Dual-band Wireless-AC connectivity for streaming HD media and seamless web surfing
HDMI and DisplayPort for Dual Display support
Lightweight, small form design that supports VESA mount

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars26 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
